name: cloudnet
author: floxsvk@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# 
# CloudNet Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add --no-cache wget unzip

mkdir -p /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server/

wget --no-check-certificate https://ci.cloudnetservice.eu/job/CloudNetService/job/CloudNet-v3/job/development/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/CloudNet.zip

unzip CloudNet.zip

rm CloudNet.zip

echo -e "install complete"

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'launcher.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.
